  • Constructor Details

    • RobotMath

      public RobotMath()

  • Method Details

    • relativeAngle

      public static double relativeAngle(double pivotAngle, double targetAngle)
      For systems where angles are given in the domain [-180, 180]: Returns the angle of some target angle relative to some pivot angle That is, it returns the angle of the target angle as though the pivot angle were at 0 degrees. This accounts for the restriction that angles must be in this specific domain.
      Parameters:
      pivotAngle - The angle that the target angle is relative to
      targetAngle - The angle whose relative angle to the pivot angle will be returned
      Returns:
      The relative angle to the target angle (i.e. if the pivot angle were at 0) in the domain [-180, 180]

    • shiftAngle

      public static double shiftAngle(double pivotAngle, double deltaAngle)
      For systems where angles are given in the domain [-180, 180]: Returns the resultant angle from adding some delta angle to a pivot angle, accounting for the restriction that angles must be in this specific domain.
      Parameters:
      pivotAngle - The angle that the deltaAngle is being added to (shifted)
      deltaAngle - The angle being added to pivot angle (the shift)
      Returns:
      The resultant angle of the shift in the domain [-180, 180]

    • approximatelyZero

      public static boolean approximatelyZero(double value)
      Checking whether a number appoximates zero based on the threshholds set in Constants.RobotMathConstants
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be checked
      Returns:
      True if the value approximates zero, false otherwise

    • approxZero

      public static boolean approxZero(double value, double threshhold)
      Checking whether a number appoximates zero based on the threshhold given.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be checked
      threshhold - Determines how close the value needs to be to zero to pass
      Returns:
      True if the value approximates zero, false otherwise

    • constrain180

      public static double constrain180(double angle)
      Takes any angle in degrees in the domain (-infinity, infinitiy) and returns its value relative to 0 in the domain [-180, 180].
      Parameters:
      angle - The absolute angle in the domain (-infinity, infinity)
      Returns:
      The angle's value relative to 0 in the domain [-180, 180]

    • sumForEach

      public static <T> double sumForEach(T[] values, ToDoubleFunction<T> doubleConversion)
      Takes an array of objects of generic type T and a function which converts such objects into a double value, and returns the sum of doing this conversion for each element in the array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type being iterated over
      Parameters:
      values - The values being iterated over and being given a corresponding double value
      doubleConversion - The function that converts an object of type T into a double
      Returns:
      The sum of the result of applying 'doubleConversion' to all T objects in 'values'

    • sumForEach

      public static <T> int sumForEach(T[] values, ToIntFunction<T> intConversion)
      Takes an array of objects of generic type T and a function which converts such objects into an int value, and returns the sum of doing this conversion for each element in the array.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type being iterated over
      Parameters:
      values - The values being iterated over and being given a corresponding int value
      intConversion - The function that converts an object of type T into an int
      Returns:
      The sum of the result of applying 'intConversion' to all T objects in 'values'
